scripts.pre-commit: npm run fix-schemas-with-refs && npx ts-node scripts/mintlify/split-openapi-by-tags.ts && npm run generate-endpoints-coverage-doc -- --generateFor=default && npm run build-update-md-tables-from-openapi && npm run prepare-open-api-for-all-published-sdks && npm run build-production-openapi
scripts.prepare-open-api-for-all-published-sdks: npm run prepare-open-api -- --language=ruby && npm run prepare-open-api -- --language=java && npm run prepare-open-api -- --language=php && npm run prepare-open-api -- --language=python && npm run prepare-open-api -- --language=js && npm run prepare-open-api -- --language=dotnet
scripts.generate-sdk-ruby: npm run generate-endpoints-coverage-doc -- --generateFor=ruby;rm -r ./sdks/ruby/lib;rm -r ./sdks/ruby/docs;npm run prepare-open-api -- --language=ruby;java -jar openapi-generator-jar/openapi-generator-cli-7.0.1.jar generate -i ./reference/readonly-sdks/ruby/OpenAPI.json -g ruby -o ./sdks/ruby -t ./mustache-templates/ruby-client --additional-properties=gemName=VoucherifySdk,gemVersion=8.0.3; rm -rf ./sdks/ruby/spec; ts-node scripts/sdks/ruby/update-ruby-dockreefile-sdk-version.ts;npm run search-and-replace-in-files -- --path=ruby
scripts.generate-sdk-java: npm run generate-endpoints-coverage-doc -- --generateFor=java;rm -r ./sdks/java/src/main;rm -r ./sdks/java/docs;rm -r ./sdks/java/api;npm run prepare-open-api -- --language=java;java -jar openapi-generator-jar/openapi-generator-cli-7.1.0.jar generate -i ./reference/readonly-sdks/java/OpenAPI.json -g java -o ./sdks/java -t mustache-templates/java --additional-properties=VoucherifySdk,artifactVersion=17.0.1,testOutput=./tmp/java/generated-tests,artifactId=voucherify-java-sdk,groupId=io.voucherify.client,apiPackage=io.voucherify.client.api,modelPackage=io.voucherify.client.model,invokerPackage=io.voucherify.client; rm -rf ./tmp/java/generated-tests;npm run search-and-replace-in-files -- --path=java
scripts.generate-sdk-php: npm run generate-endpoints-coverage-doc -- --generateFor=php;rm -r ./sdks/php/src;npm run prepare-open-api -- --language=php;java -jar openapi-generator-jar/openapi-generator-cli-7.0.1.jar generate -i ./reference/readonly-sdks/php/OpenAPI.json -g php-nextgen -o ./sdks/php -t ./mustache-templates/php-nextgen --additional-properties=variableNamingConvention=camelCase,developerOrganization=voucherify,developerOrganizationUrl=https://www.voucherify.io/,composerPackageName=rspective/voucherify,artifactVersion=5.0.3;npm run search-and-replace-in-files -- --path=php
scripts.generate-sdk-python: npm run generate-endpoints-coverage-doc -- --generateFor=python;rm -r ./sdks/python/voucherify_client;npm run prepare-open-api -- --language=python;java -jar openapi-generator-jar/openapi-generator-cli-7.8.0.jar generate -i ./reference/readonly-sdks/python/OpenAPI.json -g python -o ./sdks/python -t ./mustache-templates/python --additional-properties=packageName=voucherify,packageVersion=6.0.0,packageUrl=https://voucherify.io/,projectName=voucherify;npm run search-and-replace-in-files -- --path=python
scripts.generate-sdk-js: mv ./sdks/js/test ./sdks/js/testToRestore;scripts/sdks/js/clean-js-sdk-files.sh && npm run generate-endpoints-coverage-doc -- --generateFor=js;npm run prepare-open-api -- --language=js;java -jar openapi-generator-jar/openapi-generator-cli-7.16.0.jar generate -i ./reference/readonly-sdks/js/OpenAPI.json -g javascript -o ./sdks/js -t ./mustache-templates/javascript --additional-properties=packageName=@voucherify/sdk,projectVersion=3.0.2,packageUrl=https://voucherify.io/,projectName=voucherify,licenseName=MIT,npmName=@voucherify/sdk,npmRepository=git+https://github.com/voucherifyio/voucherify-js-sdk.git;mv ./sdks/js/test ./sdks/js/testToDelete;mv ./sdks/js/testToRestore ./sdks/js/test;rm -rf ./sdks/js/testToDelete;rm sdks/js/mocha.opts;rm sdks/js/yarn.lock;node scripts/sdks/js/fix-JS-sdk-types.js;node scripts/sdks/js/fix-JS-sdk-required-properties-types.js
scripts.generate-sdk-dotnet: mv ./sdks/dotnet/src/Voucherify.Test ./sdks/dotnet/src/TMP.Test;npm run generate-endpoints-coverage-doc -- --generateFor=dotnet; npm run prepare-open-api -- --language=dotnet; java -jar openapi-generator-jar/openapi-generator-cli-7.12.0.jar generdotate -i ./reference/readonly-sdks/dotnet/OpenAPI.json -g csharp -o ./sdks/dotnet -t ./mustache-templates/csharp --additional-properties=packageCompany=Voucherify,packageCopyright=MIT,packageAuthors=Voucherify,packageTitle=VoucherifySDK,packageName=Voucherify,hideGenerationTimestamp=true,modelPropertyNaming=PascalCase,nullableReferenceTypes=false,netCoreProjectFile=true,useSourceGeneration=false,optionalMethodArgument=true,packageVersion=9.0.0,conditionalSerialization=true,optionalEmitDefaultValues=true,useDateTimeForDate=true,useDateTimeOffset=true,nullableReferenceTypes=false,targetFramework=netstandard2.0; rm -r ./sdks/dotnet/Voucherify.sln;mv ./sdks/dotnet/src/Voucherify.Test ./sdks/dotnet/src/TODELETE.Test;mv ./sdks/dotnet/src/TMP.Test ./sdks/dotnet/src/Voucherify.Test;rm -r ./sdks/dotnet/src/TODELETE.Test;rm -rf ./sdks/dotnet/src/Voucherify/bin;rm -rf ./sdks/dotnet/lib;npm run search-and-replace-in-files -- --path=dotnet;node scripts/sdks/dotnet/fix-enums-in-dotnet.js;ts-node scripts/sdks/dotnet/fix-dotnet-imports.ts;cd sdks/dotnet;dotnet build src/Voucherify/Voucherify.csproj && mv src/Voucherify/bin/Debug lib;nuget pack src/Voucherify/Voucherify.nuspec;cd ../..;
scripts.generate-sdks: concurrently "npm run generate-sdk-ruby" "npm run generate-sdk-java" "npm run generate-sdk-php" "npm run generate-sdk-python" "npm run generate-sdk-dotnet"  "npm run generate-sdk-js"
scripts.test-sdks: rm -rf ./logs && mkdir -p logs && (npm run test-dotnet-sdk 2>&1 | tee ./logs/dotnet-tests.log) && echo 'Dotnet SDK test completed - check ./logs/dotnet-tests.log' && (npm run test-ruby-sdk 2>&1 | tee ./logs/ruby-tests.log) && echo 'Ruby SDK test completed - check ./logs/ruby-tests.log' && (npm run test-php-sdk 2>&1 | tee ./logs/php-tests.log) && echo 'Php SDK test completed - check ./logs/php-tests.log' && (npm run test-java-sdk 2>&1 | tee ./logs/java-tests.log) && echo 'Java SDK test completed - check ./logs/java-tests.log' && (npm run test-python-sdk 2>&1 | tee ./logs/python-tests.log) && echo 'Python SDK test completed - check ./logs/python-tests.log' && (npm run test-js-sdk 2>&1 | tee ./logs/js-tests.log) && echo 'JS SDK test completed - check ./logs/js-tests.log'
scripts.test-python-sdk: mkdir -p logs && rm -f ./logs/python-tests.log && (cd ./sdks/python && docker build -t python . && docker run --rm python) 2>&1 | tee ./logs/python-tests.log && echo 'Python SDK test completed - check ./logs/python-tests.log'
scripts.test-php-sdk: mkdir -p logs && rm -f ./logs/php-tests.log && (cd ./sdks/php && docker build -t php . && docker run --rm php) 2>&1 | tee ./logs/php-tests.log && echo 'Php SDK test completed - check ./logs/php-tests.log'
scripts.test-java-sdk: mkdir -p logs && rm -f ./logs/java-tests.log && (cd ./sdks/java && docker build -t java . && docker run --rm java) 2>&1 | tee ./logs/java-tests.log && echo 'Java SDK test completed - check ./logs/java-tests.log'
scripts.test-ruby-sdk: mkdir -p logs && rm -f ./logs/ruby-tests.log && (cd ./sdks/ruby && docker build -t ruby . && docker run --rm ruby) 2>&1 | tee ./logs/ruby-tests.log && echo 'Ruby SDK test completed - check ./logs/ruby-tests.log'
scripts.test-js-sdk: mkdir -p logs && rm -f ./logs/js-tests.log && (cd ./sdks/js && docker build -t js . && docker run --rm js) 2>&1 | tee ./logs/js-tests.log && echo 'JS SDK test completed - check ./logs/js-tests.log'
scripts.test-dotnet-sdk: mkdir -p logs && rm -f ./logs/dotnet-tests.log && (cd ./sdks/dotnet && docker build -t dotnet . && docker run --rm dotnet) 2>&1 | tee ./logs/dotnet-tests.log && echo 'Dotnet SDK test completed - check ./logs/dotnet-tests.log'
